review: Have only played a couple of games but I can already tell it has potential, dont listen to all the people giving it Negative reviews as it will only make the game sink.. As said in the Alpha walkthough this is not a Supreme Commander rip off, if anything it has more in common with Z (capture nodes to win) The game as it is atm is a little big buggy (as expected) but still fun to play.. Thoroughly looking forward to the Full realease
